title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook the spaghetti in salted boiling water.
Whisk eggs and cheese together in a bowl.
Drain pasta and combine with pancetta.
Remove from heat, add egg-cheese mix, stir quickly.
Serve with black pepper on top.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt & tikka masala paste overnight.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until cooked.
Cook onions until soft, add tomatoes and simmer.
Blend sauce, return to pan, add cream.
Add chicken pieces, simmer for 10 minutes.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Avocado Toast
summary: Toasted bread topped with smashed avocado, salt, pepper, and a drizzle of olive oil.
ingredients: Fresh herbs (parsley or cilantro) for garnish
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden and crispy.
Cut the avocado in half, remove the pit, and scoop the flesh into a bowl.
Mash the avocado with a fork and mix in lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
Spread the mashed avocado evenly over the toasted bread slices.
Top with chili flakes, a boiled or fried egg, and fresh herbs if desired.
Serve immediately while the toast is still warm and crispy.
